resources.string:
This app was written by Alex Crowley, Aaron Bartee and Anirudh Singh.
 Features:
 Sync Gmail by allowing our app to access contacts and your gmail
 Use Navigation drawer to access the features
 Tap into your subscriptions to access all emails
 Favorite the subscriptions you enjoy the most
Flag the emails you want to save
 Swipe left or right to delete the emails from gmail
 Long press the subscriptions you want to blacklist
